DefaultGoldDice.Name: Default starting gold roll
DefaultGoldDice.Hint: Here you can customize the starting gold dice rolled on the tool

ShowRolls.Name: Show rolls on chat
ShowRolls.Hint: Show ability score, hp per level and starting gold rolls as chat messages

IndividualPanelScroll.Name: Individual panel scrolls
IndividualPanelScroll.Hint: In tabs with left and right panels, make each side have independent scrolls

UseTokenizer.Name: Use Tokenizer if available
UseTokenizer.Hint: The tool will try to use the Tokenizer module, if found, as default to generate avatar and token pictures

FightingStyleString.Name: Fighting Style feature name
FightingStyleString.Hint: Name used to identify and handle Fighting Style features (in case you are using feature items in another language). Default - 'Fighting Style'

EquipmentBlacklist.Name: Equipment Blacklist
EquipmentBlacklist.Hint: Items (Equipment) not shown for purchase, by name (case-sensitive, separated by ';', spaces are ok). Only 'common' rarity items are shown, but this list excludes the few magical/unreasonable common items. Default - 'Potion of Climbing; Potion of Healing; Spell Scroll 1st Level; Spell Scroll Cantrip Level; Unarmed Strike'

SubraceNameBlacklist.Name: Subrace Names Blacklist
SubraceNameBlacklist.Hint: Items excluded by name from been Subraces (case-sensitive, separated by ';', spaces are ok). Used by default to exclude things like Gnome Cunning from registering as Gnome subclasses. Default - 'Gnome Cunning; Halfling Nimbleness'

ButtonOnDialogInsteadOfActorsDirectory.Name: Create Actor dialog button
ButtonOnDialogInsteadOfActorsDirectory.Hint: If the button interferes with other modules, or you prefer the aesthetic of having a single 'create actor' button to not confuse your players

AbilityRollFormula.Name: Formula used to roll stats (per stat)

Sources.Name: Compendium Sources
Sources.Hint: Select the compendia that will serve as data source for the different creation steps
Sources.Label: Select sources

Permissions.NeedCreateActorError: User requires the 'Create New Actors' permission. Ask your DM to add it to your role
Permissions.NeedCreateItemWarn: User without 'Create New Items' permission. You will not be able to create custom Features
Permissions.NeedFileUploadWarn: User without 'Use File Browser' permission. You might experience issues selecting images
Permissions.NeedFileBrowseWarn: User without 'Upload New Files' permission. You might experience issues selecting images

Tokenizer.WarningOn: Tokenizer module is set as preferred, you can shift-click to use the default File Picker
Tokenizer.NeedActorName: Tokenizer needs a character name; please complete that first

Error.ModuleNotFound: Tokenizer not found, using default FilePicker
Error.ModuleInactive: Tokenizer found but not active, using default FilePicker
Error.VersionUnobtainable: Error getting Tokenizer version, using default FilePicker
Error.VersionIncompatible: Tokenizer version needs to be newer than {version}

Common.ProfDialogContent: Select existing proficiency or define a custom one?

Error.ActorCreationError: An error occurred when creating the actor with name {name}, aborting..
Error.CustomItemWithoutName: Can't create custom feature on {origin} - Item name is mandatory (Item will be skipped)
Error.RequiredOptionNotFulfilled: Option {opt} is required but not fulfilled.

Start.Title: Start
Start.Welcome: Welcome to the Hero Creation Tool for DnD 5e
Start.p1: The Hero Creation Tool is a step-by-step process for creating a brand-new character for your games. Changes are saved as you progress, but the character is only created upon completion.
Start.p2: The tool supports SRD material available within FoundryVTT by default. You can add further content by defining compendia in the settings with your own custom races, classes, features and others.
Start.Remark: Your Adventure Awaits! Get started by clicking Next.
Start.Faq: If you have any doubts, please check our FAQ.
Start.HowTo: If you are a DM wanting to add custom races, classes and etc, you can read our How-To.

Race.Title: Race
Race.DescriptionPlaceholder: Please select a race to see its description (subrace would show at the end)
Race.InvalidProfKeys: Invalid proficiency values for modeKey[{modeKey}], proficiencyKey[{proficiencyKey}] and proficiency[{proficiency}]

Class.DescriptionPlaceholder: Please select a class to see its description

PointBuy.OverLimit: You have gone over the maximum points allowed for Point Buy

Spells.SelectItemError: Incorrect itemName on Spells tab search entry

Submit.Title: Confirm choices?
Submit.Content: You can go back and review and/or change anything before the hero is created.
